com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute
Class CapabilityAttributeToAttributePropagationValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.DeployAttributeValidator
      com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.CapabilityAttributeToAttributePropagationValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeployAttributeValidator
public class CapabilityAttributeToAttributePropagationValidator
extends DeployAttributeValidator

Utility class for validating the propagation of an attribute from the capability of a unit to the capability of another unit.

The units may be linked via a requirement dependency link, or via a hosting link.

If the requirement is not consumed by the unit of the capability, but by one that is down the stack, users may invoke setSearchInHostingStack(boolean). 

 +------------------------+
 | TrgCap : $targetEClass |
 |          (or subtype)  |
 +------------------------+
 | EAttribute             |
 +------------------------+
              ˆ
        Capabilities
              |        
 +------------------------+
 | TrgUnit:  Unit         |
 +------------------------+
              |
         Requirements
              v
 +------------------------+                           +-----------------------+
 | TrgReq: Requirement    |      +--------------+     | SrcCap : $sourceClass |
 | dmoEType=              | -----|DependencyLink|---->|       (or subtype)    |
 |      $sourceEClass     |      +--------------+     +-----------------------+
 |      (or subtype)      |                           | EAttribute            |
 +------------------------+                           +-----------------------+

public CapabilityAttributeToAttributePropagationValidator(java.lang.String validatorID,
                                                          EAttribute targetEAttribute,
                                                          EAttribute sourceEAttribute)
Construct a capability attribute validator where the expected value is propagated from provided capability linked to the unit provided capability.

The type of the target Capability is derived from EAttribute#getEContainingClass()

Parameters:
validatorID - the identifier of the validator.
targetEAttribute - the target capability attribute.
sourceEAttribute - the source capability attribute.

Method Detail

validate

public void validate(DeployModelObject object,
                     IDeployValidationContext context,
                     IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates the propagation of the capability attribute over the object.

Parameters:
object - the object whose attribute is to be validated.
context - the validation context.
reporter - the validation reporter.

setSearchInHostingStack

public void setSearchInHostingStack(boolean search)
Configures the validator to look for a requirement of the matching type down the target unit's hosting stack.

Parameters:
search - true if the hosting stack should be search for the first matching requirement.

getSearchInHostingStack

public boolean getSearchInHostingStack()
Returns:
true if the hosting stack should be search for the first matching requirement.

validate

public void validate(Unit unit,
                     Capability targetCap,
                     IDeployValidationContext context,
                     IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates the propagation over the specified capability provided by the unit.

Parameters:
unit - the unit whose provided capability is the target of propagation.
targetCap - the provided capability of the unit which is a subtype of the target EClass.
context - the validation context.
reporter - the validation reporter.
